## WorkerDecoderProtocol.DecodeTileRequest interface

This object is sent to the decoder asking to decode a specific tile. The expected response type is a \[\[DecodedTile\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface DecodeTileRequest extends WorkerServiceProtocol.ServiceRequest 
```
